headline: FIS Appoints Anil Chakravarthy to the Board of Directors
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., January 22, 2026--Global financial technology leader FISÂ® (NYSE: FIS) today announced the appointment of Anil Chakravarthy to its Board of Directors (the "Board"). His appointment increases the size of the Board from nine to ten directors, nine of whom, including Mr. Chakravarthy, are independent.

headline: GPN's Worldpay Expands Its Solutions Reach via Regions Bank Partnership
summary: Global Payments' subsidiary Worldpay teams up with Regions Bank to deliver secure, multi-channel payment solutions across roughly 1,250 branches of the latter.
